title: Ticket #6051: Blahp can crash on proxy refresh
description:
When the blahp is configured to not create a limited form of the job's proxy (blah_disable_limited_proxy=yes in the blahp config file), the blahp will crash when the BLAH_JOB_REFRESH_PROXY command is received.

This was originally reported and fixed in the OSG's system (SOFTWARE-2475): https://jira.opensciencegrid.org/browse/SOFTWARE-2475
